generated_description: astha infra engg (india) pvt. ltd. is an engineering procurement and construction company established in 2002. they specialize in the design, development, and manufacture of a comprehensive range of equipment for process, power generation, and associated industries. they are the pioneer and oldest supplier and exporter of hydraulic jacking systems and equipment for tank erection, slip-forming systems, and all grades of aluminum ingots and scraps. their manufacturing plant is located in mumbai, and each machine is quality checked, performance tested, and carefully packed. astha infrac is committed to providing first-class customer service and building long-lasting relationships with their clients. they also manufacture and supply a wide range of car parking equipment, including one-on-one car stackers, hydraulic car parking stackers up to 3 levels, hydraulic stack parking systems, pit type hydraulic stackering systems, hydraulic puzzle parking systems.
